1.title: Avoid Extreme Temperatures
1.description: Keep your device between 20°C and 35°C. Extreme heat damages battery cells permanently.

2.title: Optimal Charging Range
2.description: Keep battery between 20-80% for longest lifespan. Avoid full 0-100% cycles regularly.

3.title: Use Original Charger
3.description: Original or certified chargers ensure proper voltage and current for safe charging.

4.title: Avoid Overnight Charging
4.description: Modern phones handle this, but unplugging at 80-90% extends battery longevity.

5.title: Reduce Screen Brightness
5.description: Display is the biggest power consumer. Use auto-brightness or keep it moderate.

6.title: Close Background Apps
6.description: Apps running in background drain battery. Regularly close unused applications.

7.title: Store at 50% Charge
7.description: If storing device long-term, keep battery at 50% in a cool, dry place.

8.title: Enable Battery Saver
8.description: Use battery saver mode when below 20% to extend usage time significantly.
